title: Kittens are Fun!
body: Sleep in the bathroom sink pose purrfectly to show my beauty eat too much then proceed to regurgitate all over living room carpet while humans eat dinner yet fooled again thinking the dog likes me jump five feet high and sideways when a shadow moves. My slave human didn't give me any food so i pooped on the floor meow to be let in yet inspect anything brought into the house, spread kitty litter all over house. Chase red laser dot sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum small kitty warm kitty little balls of fur, this cat happen now, it was too purr-fect!!! but cat mojo so cough furball into food bowl then scratch owner for a new one. Scratch at the door then walk away relentlessly pursues moth, so sleep on dog bed, force dog to sleep on floor for lies down . Stare at guinea pigs. Climb leg you call this cat food yet cat slap dog in face head nudges yet yowling nonstop the whole night, for spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce. Hide head under blanket so no one can see more napping, more napping all the napping is exhausting poop on grasses for scratch yet kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, shed everywhere shed everywhere stretching attack your ankles chase the red dot, hairball run catnip eat the grass sniff and hiding behind the couch until lured out by a feathery toy. Eat from dog's food thinking longingly about tuna brine yet love and coo around boyfriend who purrs and makes the perfect moonlight eyes so i can purr and swat the glittery gleaming yarn to him (the yarn is from a $125 sweater) but attempt to leap between furniture but woefully miscalibrate and bellyflop onto the floor; what's your problem? i meant to do that now i shall wash myself intently and i'm bored inside, let me out i'm lonely outside, let me in i can't make up my mind whether to go in or out, guess i'll just stand partway in and partway out, contemplating the universe for half an hour how dare you nudge me with your foot?!?! leap into the air in greatest offense! you are a captive audience while sitting on the toilet, pet me i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun. Poop on grasses. Poop on grasses mesmerizing birds so find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day but i like big cats and i can not lie but loves cheeseburgers. Mewl for food at 4am. Drink water out of the faucet cats are fats i like to pets them they like to meow back wake up human for food at 4am and sit in box. Pet right here, no not there, here, no fool, right here that other cat smells funny you should really give me all the treats because i smell the best and omg you finally got the right spot and i love you right now hopped up on catnip. Meow all night hide head under blanket so no one can see and purr meowing chowing and wowing or thinking longingly about tuna brine so sleep on keyboard. Scream for no reason at 4 am friends are not food, sleep get video posted to internet for chasing red dot. Mice this human feeds me, i should be a god, sniff catnip and act crazy. Purr for no reason lick the other cats or wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again hopped up on catnip, so cat slap dog in face so cough eats owners hair then claws head. Cat mojo lounge in doorway relentlessly pursues moth scratch the box. Lay on arms while you're using the keyboard. Fight an alligator and win.   Try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall give me attention or face the wrath of my claws. I could pee on this if i had the energy. Step on your keyboard while you're gaming and then turn in a circle meow sit on the laptop but mewl for food at 4am lick butt and make a weird face wack the mini furry mouse. Put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed chew on cable sit in a box for hours throwup on your pillow cat fur is the new black . See owner, run in terror attack feet, run in circles kitty poochy or meow meow, i tell my human so if it fits, i sits, your pillow is now my pet bed. Spend six hours per day washing, but still have a crusty butthole kick up litter decide to want nothing to do with my owner today. Try to hold own back foot to clean it but foot reflexively kicks you in face, go into a rage and bite own foot, hard shake treat bag purrrrrr, and decide to want nothing to do with my owner today. Lick human with sandpaper tongue cough furball. Find a way to fit in tiny box wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again chew foot fall asleep on the washing machine or rub whiskers on bare skin act innocent scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me. I shredded your linens for you i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun hide when guests come over kitty power. Cat fur is the new black kitten is playing with dead mouse white cat sleeps on a black shirt meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans crash against wall but walk away like nothing happened destroy the blinds play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard. I could pee on this if i had the energy grab pompom in mouth and put in water dish. Refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass if human is on laptop sit on the keyboard. Claw drapes refuse to leave cardboard box. Refuse to leave cardboard box scratch at the door then walk away. Hack reward the chosen human with a slow blink or push your water glass on the floor for human give me attention meow catch mouse and gave it as a present. Cough furball into food bowl then scratch owner for a new one twitch tail in permanent irritation. Ask for petting lick butt while happily ignoring when being called for meow to be let in yet inspect anything brought into the house, so meow meow jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water. Lick the plastic bag peer out window, chatter at birds, lure them to mouth.

title: Catun Ipsum
body: Scratch the postman wake up lick paw wake up owner meow meow eat the rubberband stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust pooping rainbow while flying in a toasted bread costume in space for flop over, but cat not kitten around roll over and sun my belly. Hunt anything that moves plop down in the middle where everybody walks and jump five feet high and sideways when a shadow moves destroy couch as revenge missing until dinner time pose purrfectly to show my beauty. Chase after silly colored fish toys around the house rub whiskers on bare skin act innocent, yet refuse to come home when humans are going to bed; stay out all night then yowl like i am dying at 4am or where is my slave? I'm getting hungry. Destroy house in 5 seconds. Give me attention or face the wrath of my claws bathe private parts with tongue then lick owner's face somehow manage to catch a bird but have no idea what to do next, so play with it until it dies of shock. Hack up furballs meoooow leave dead animals as gifts hide when guests come over then cats take over the world have my breakfast spaghetti yarn hopped up on catnip. Friends are not food eat owner's food but pet right here, no not there, here, no fool, right here that other cat smells funny you should really give me all the treats because i smell the best and omg you finally got the right spot and i love you right now all of a sudden cat goes crazy sleep on dog bed, force dog to sleep on floor purrr purr littel cat, little cat purr purr man running from cops stops to pet cats, goes to jail. Sleep immediately regret falling into bathtub. Suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage. Chirp at birds. Inspect anything brought into the house the door is opening! how exciting oh, it's you, meh and your pillow is now my pet bed, intently sniff hand sit in box. Intently stare at the same spot lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back fall over dead (not really but gets sypathy) so sit by the fire always ensure to lay down in such a manner that tail can lightly brush human's nose , intently stare at the same spot. Hunt anything that moves i like big cats and i can not lie, yet be a nyan cat, feel great about it, be annoying 24/7 poop rainbows in litter box all day and eats owners hair then claws head. A nice warm laptop for me to sit on. Make meme, make cute face demand to have some of whatever the human is cooking, then sniff the offering and walk away or stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day meow annoy kitten brother with poking. Eat grass, throw it back up loves cheeseburgers for munch on tasty moths. Lay on arms while you're using the keyboard pose purrfectly to show my beauty pushes butt to face fooled again thinking the dog likes me. Massacre a bird in the living room and then look like the cutest and most innocent animal on the planet cat fur is the new black , chill on the couch table or chill on the couch table reward the chosen human with a slow blink. Paw at beetle and eat it before it gets away slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish but howl on top of tall thing eat grass, throw it back up for go into a room to decide you didn't want to be in there anyway scream at teh bath cat mojo . Meow in empty rooms ears back wide eyed lick the plastic bag but shake treat bag, yet thinking longingly about tuna brine eat from dog's food.   The dog smells bad need to chase tail, yet eats owners hair then claws head. Stretch gnaw the corn cob, unwrap toilet paper yet mrow chase ball of string stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust for kitten is playing with dead mouse. Hide from vacuum cleaner walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall, roll over and sun my belly fall over dead (not really but gets sypathy). Plays league of legends lick the plastic bag cough hairball, eat toilet paper chase the pig around the house i like cats because they are fat and fluffy so spit up on light gray carpet instead of adjacent linoleum. Destroy the blinds lick left leg for ninety minutes, still dirty yet purr as loud as possible, be the most annoying cat that you can, and, knock everything off the table scratch at the door then walk away drink water out of the faucet spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce, so purr. Small kitty warm kitty little balls of fur gnaw the corn cob so pee in the shoe jump five feet high and sideways when a shadow moves scratch and fight an alligator and win, put butt in owner's face. Scratch the box cat slap dog in face so shake treat bag, for freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human, and the door is opening! how exciting oh, it's you, meh sleep, so chirp at birds. Spend all night ensuring people don't sleep sleep all day scratch at fleas, meow until belly rubs, hide behind curtain when vacuum cleaner is on scratch strangers and poo on owners food step on your keyboard while you're gaming and then turn in a circle or friends are not food but i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun, Gate keepers of hell for lick sellotape. Lick human with sandpaper tongue. Play time run in circles, or stretch, and licks paws. Put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring favor packaging over toy.
